name: codeGirl 2.1
description:
The second card in codeGirl story.
revised & dateStamped

It is a StoryBlox:
A Spatial, Interactive work, pinned to IPFS
They rotate for normal displays but are also fully interactive to explore spatially and advance the narrative.

These StoryBlox are stand-alone but also link together to create a greater whole:
codeGirl is an interactive Visual Story that has won awards at the Tribeca Film Festival and London's Pixel Market. Here it has been completely reimagined for decentralized Web3 & I've recreated the assets in & for #VR.
